QuestData.Title: To Stars' Rest!
QuestData.Description: When you are ready I will place you on my fastest gryphon to Stars' Rest. Once you get there, find and speak with Archmage Modera.$B$BGood luck, ally!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with the Image of Archmage Modera at Stars' Rest in western Dragonblight.
QuestData.RewardText: Vas heard my distress call then, eh? Not a moment too soon, friend.
